item.title: Scooter Braun’s Response to Still-Angry Taylor Swift Fans on Catalog Purchase: “They Made the Horrible Miscalculation That I Care”
item.description: The executive is addressing the hate he still receives from Swifties for the years-long feud over her catalog.

item.title: Scooter Braun Calls ‘Swag’ the “Most Authentically Justin Bieber Album to Date”
